info: Contributed to developing functional user interfaces for the online trading platform Traddle.io, enhancing usability and performance
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features, ensuring seamless integration with backend services
Optimized front-end code for better responsiveness and faster load times across devices
Designed and built all major UI screens for the MindCleanse app, including the Splash Screen, Login Screens, Settings Screen, and Main Dashboard, ensuring a cohesive and user-friendly experience
Focused on responsive design and accessibility, ensuring the app functions seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align UI development with project goals and integrate front-end components with backend systems
